name: Dragon Typing
description:
A dragon realises they need to go CYBER in 2020 so decides that it's time to learn to type. This is a game for dragons who need to adjust to the new normal.

This is a work in progress and is my entry for Fuse Jam #4 (deadline of Sunday 13th Dec), where you are given two themes as starting points and you 'fuse' them together. For my starting points I had a crying face emoji and two dragons having a fight.

Programming, sound, voice acting and artwork by Richard Jackson

Concept / script developed by Richard Jackson and Becca Smithers
